news.title: The clock is ticking down on a critical Pentagon deadline for Anthropic | CNN Business
news.description: American AI company Anthropic has until 5:01 pm ET to give in to the Pentagon’s demands or face being labeled a “supply chain risk,” a type of designation usually reserved for companies thought to be extensions of foreign adversaries.
